sub_title: Owner of danibu | Communication Consultant, Trainer and Presenter | Freelance & Interim
summary:
I’m Dani Buijtenhek, a seasoned communicator, trainer and presenter, made in Germany and globally active. After 20 years of in-house communication roles with some of the world’s leading brands across industries and geographies, I’ve transitioned into the consulting field and started my own company in 2015: danibu. 

Through danibu, I marry my corporate experience with presentation confidence and consulting excellence. My assignments (Freelance projects or Interim roles) specialize in the areas of Corporate communication, Employee communication, Leadership communication, Campaign management, Event management, Video productions, Speaking engagements and Communication & Presentation training.

I’ve come to appreciate that employee engagement is key for business success – especially in times of change. And so, my track record has been mainly around global employee and leadership communication during transformation, organizational change and (post-merger) integrations. 

Fully comfortable working in five different languages (German, English, Dutch, Spanish and French), and equipped with an Executive Master in Communication Management from the University of Lugano, Switzerland, I bring together intercultural sensitivity and German Gründlichkeit. 

My passion for dancing Argentine Tango parallels my communication philosophy: Blending creativity with disciplined execution. This brings cadence to the process and delivers tangible business benefits to a variety of satisfied, international clients that I’ve been serving through danibu since 2015, such as FedEx, TNT, ABN AMRO, Nutricia, Quadriga, Applied Materials, Teva Pharmaceuticals, DOMO Chemicals, AnaBio, LogMeIn and Schoeller Allibert.
